pages.title: Description
pages.text: The Golden Apple Cow is an accidental mutation after some apple cows tried to eat left out golden apples from chests. Unfortunately, the power of the golden apples changed their composition. They wander across the planes and spawn a bit rarer than Apple Cows, but are still worth looking for!
